# Geunhyeong Lee - Research Publications

> Dr. Geunhyeong Lee is a Scientist at FRIB (Facility for Rare Isotope Beams) at Michigan State University. His research focuses on AI-driven design optimization, additive manufacturing, heat exchangers, electromagnetic pumps, and magnetohydrodynamics for nuclear engineering applications.

## About
- Name: Dr. Geunhyeong Lee (이근형)
- Position: Scientist at FRIB, Michigan State University
- Research Areas: AI/ML optimization, Heat transfer, Electromagnetic pumps, MHD, Nuclear engineering, 3D printing
- Website: https://geunhyeong.com
- Publications: https://geunhyeong.com/publications/

## Publications (SCIE Journals)

### [14] FRIB Beam Dump Optimization (2026) - Accepted
- Title: Optimization of the FRIB Beam Dump: A Hybrid Genetic Algorithm and Reinforcement Learning Approach
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, J. Song, R. Quispe-Abad, M. Patil, T. Kanemura
- Journal: Nuclear Science and Techniques (Accepted)
- Impact: JCR Top 3.7% in Nuclear Science & Technology (IF: 3.8)
- Keywords: genetic algorithm, reinforcement learning, FRIB, beam dump, optimization, thermal management

### [13] 3D-Printable DC Electromagnetic Pump (2026)
- Title: Conceptual Design of a 3D-Printable DC Electromagnetic Pump for Additive Manufacturing
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee
- Journal: Nuclear Engineering and Technology, 58(1), 103916
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.net.2025.103916
- Keywords: electromagnetic pump, 3D printing, additive manufacturing, liquid metal

### [12] AI Anomaly Detection for Accelerator (2025)
- Title: Deep learning-based anomaly detection in drift tube quadrupole operation for the KOMAC linac
- Authors: D. Kim, H. Kim, H. Kwon, Y. Yu, Geunhyeong Lee
- Journal: Journal of Nuclear Science and Technology, 62(8), 709-714
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1080/00223131.2025.2464742
- Keywords: deep learning, anomaly detection, LSTM, particle accelerator, KOMAC

### [11] Deep Reinforcement Learning Heat Exchanger Optimization (2024)
- Title: Design optimization of heat exchanger using deep reinforcement learning
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, Y. Joo, S.U. Lee, T. Kim, Y. Yu, H.G. Kim
- Journal: International Communications in Heat and Mass Transfer, 159, 107991
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.icheatmasstransfer.2024.107991
- Impact: JCR Top 5.1% in Mechanics (IF: 6.4)
- Keywords: deep reinforcement learning, topology optimization, heat exchanger, experimental validation

### [10] PCHE Dual-Fluid Topology Optimization (2023)
- Title: Dual-fluid Topology Optimization of Printed-circuit Heat Exchanger with Low-pumping-power Design
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, Y. Joo, Y. Yu, H.G. Kim
- Journal: Case Studies in Thermal Engineering, 49, 103318
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.csite.2023.103318
- Impact: JCR Top 5.8% in Thermodynamics (IF: 6.4)
- Keywords: topology optimization, PCHE, printed-circuit heat exchanger, thermal design

### [9] RAON Lithium Film Electromagnetic Thruster (2023)
- Title: Experimental characterization of the flowline of a lithium film formed using an electromagnetic thruster for a RAON prototype charge stripper
- Authors: T. Kang, Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Nuclear Engineering and Design, 412, 112481
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.nucengdes.2023.112481
- Keywords: electromagnetic pump, lithium film, RAON, charge stripper, heavy ion accelerator

### [8] MHD Generator Numerical Study (2021)
- Title: Numerical study of Faraday-type nitrogen plasma magnetohydrodynamic generator
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Journal of the Korean Physical Society, 78(7), 600-606
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1007/s40042-021-00116-z
- Keywords: MHD generator, plasma, magnetohydrodynamics, Faraday type

### [7] MHD Generator 10kW Design (2020)
- Title: The variable analysis of an MHD generator with electrical output of 10 kW for application to bi-plant method electricity generation
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: International Journal of Energy Research, 44(10), 8125-8132
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1002/er.5100
- Impact: JCR Top 1.5% in Nuclear Science & Technology (IF: 5.2)
- Keywords: MHD generator, electricity generation, bi-plant method

### [6] MHD Circulation Optimization (2019)
- Title: Mathematical approach for optimization of magnetohydrodynamic circulation system
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Nuclear Engineering and Technology, 51(3), 654-664
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.net.2018.12.008
- Keywords: MHD optimization, liquid metal circulation, nuclear reactor

### [5] MHD Decay Heat Removal (2018)
- Title: Magnetohydrodynamics approach for active decay heat removal system in future generation IV reactor
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: International Journal of Energy Research, 42(10), 3266-3278
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1002/er.4080
- Impact: JCR Top 1.5% in Nuclear Science & Technology (IF: 3.3)
- Keywords: decay heat removal, Generation IV reactor, passive safety, MHD

### [4] Electromagnetic Pump Design Optimization (2018)
- Title: Numerical analysis of the electromagnetic force for design optimization of a rectangular direct current electromagnetic pump
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Nuclear Engineering and Technology, 50(6), 869-876
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.net.2018.04.010
- Keywords: electromagnetic pump, DC EMP, liquid sodium, design optimization

### [3] MHD Channel Analysis for GenIV Reactor (2018)
- Title: Magnetic-field analysis of an MHD channel in a liquid-metal circulation system of a prototype GenIV sodium fast reactor
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Annals of Nuclear Energy, 115, 343-351
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.anucene.2018.01.049
- Keywords: MHD channel, sodium fast reactor, Generation IV, liquid metal

### [2] Sodium-CO2 Reaction EMP (2017)
- Title: Design analysis of DC electromagnetic pump for liquid sodium–CO2 reaction experimental characterization
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Annals of Nuclear Energy, 109, 490-497
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.1016/j.anucene.2017.05.054
- Keywords: electromagnetic pump, sodium-CO2 reaction, nuclear safety

### [1] EMP Type Comparison Study (2017)
- Title: Numerical investigation and comparison of the rectangular, cylindrical, and helical-type DC electromagnetic pumps
- Authors: Geunhyeong Lee, H.R. Kim
- Journal: Magnetohydrodynamics, 53(2), 429-438
- DOI: https://doi.org/10.22364/mhd.53.2.23
- Keywords: electromagnetic pump comparison, rectangular EMP, cylindrical EMP, helical EMP
